summary.span: 構成強型別 (Strongly Typed) 集合的基礎，這些集合是 命名空間的成員。

span.span: Forms the basis for the strongly typed collections that are members of the namespace.

Protected Overridable Function GetKey (value As Object) As String
protected: virtual System::String ^ GetKey(System::Object ^ value);

param.name: value
param.span: 要傳回索引鍵名稱的物件。

span.span: An object for which to return the name of the key.

summary.span: 傳回與以傳址 (By Reference) 方式傳遞的數值相關聯的索引鍵名稱。

span.span: Returns the name of the key associated with the value passed by reference.
A null reference.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法的預設實作是在由衍生類別覆寫以傳回與相關聯的索引鍵的名稱`value`參數。The default implementation of this method is intended to be overridden by a derived class in order to return the name of the key associated with the `value` parameter. 預設實作會傳回 null (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。The default implementation returns null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic). 只能透過這個類別或衍生的類別存取受保護的方法。This protected method is accessible only through this class or a derived class.

summary.span: 清除 執行個體的內容。

span.span: Clears the contents of the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會覆寫，以清除將衍生集合的內容時，執行額外處理。This method is intended to be overridden to perform additional processes when clearing the contents of a derived collection. 只能透過這個類別或衍生的類別存取受保護的方法。This protected method is accessible only through this class or a derived class.

summary.span: 當插入新的項目至 時，執行額外的自訂處理。

span.span: Performs additional custom processes after inserting a new element into the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法的預設實作是由以插入指定的項目時執行某些動作的衍生類別覆寫。The default implementation of this method is intended to be overridden by a derived class to perform some action when the specified element is inserted. 例如，在衍生的類別可能需要額外的驗證。For example, a derived class might need additional validation. 只能透過這個類別或衍生的類別存取受保護的方法。This protected method is accessible only through this class or a derived class.

summary.span: 設定 執行個體的父代 (Parent) 物件。

span.span: Sets the parent object of the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法的預設實作是類別的由設定適當，Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 規格為基礎的父代在衍生類別覆寫。The default implementation of this method is intended to be overridden by a derived class to set a parent of an appropriate class, based upon the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) specification. 預設實作會執行任何動作。The default implementation performs no action. 只能透過這個類別或衍生的類別存取受保護的方法。This protected method is accessible only through this class or a derived class.
